meanings.sent1: She annuitizes her retirement savings to ensure a steady income.
meanings.sent2: The financial advisor annuitizes the lump sum into monthly payments.
meanings.sent3: The magician annuitizes his tricks, turning them into a regular show.
meanings.sent4: The artist annuitizes her creativity, producing a new masterpiece each month.
meanings.sent5: The chef annuitizes her recipes, unveiling a new dish every week.

meanings.definition: To make periodic payments from an annuity.
meanings.sent1: He annuitizes his pension fund to receive monthly checks.
meanings.sent2: The insurance company annuitizes the policyholder's investment over time.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel annuitizes its acorn stash, withdrawing nuts for winter.
meanings.sent4: The student annuitizes his scholarship, receiving a portion each semester.
meanings.sent5: The gardener annuitizes the seeds, planting a few each week.
